thread.title: Thompson & Knight Welcomes Finance Partner to Mexico City Office

author: cnbc.com
title: Thompson & Knight Welcomes Finance Partner to Mexico City Office
text:
Dallas, Texas, May 16, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The law firm of Thompson & Knight LLP is pleased to announce Jorge A. Labastida has joined the Firm’s Mexico City office as a Partner in the Finance Practice Group.
“With nearly 30 years of legal experience, Jorge will be a valued asset to the Firm’s Mexico City office as it continues to grow,” said Luis F. Gomar, Thompson & Knight’s Mexico City Office Leader and a Partner in the Firm’s International Energy Practice Group. “His banking and finance expertise will further strengthen our platform in Mexico, and we look forward to utilizing his talents as a member of the team.”
Mr. Labastida focuses his practice on asset-backed and structured cross-border finance, project finance, and real estate finance, including securitizations, multi-jurisdictional tax-advantaged finance, and structured leasing. He also specializes in trustee and bondholder agent representation and handles work relating to derivatives, treasury products, restructurings, workouts, M&A, and private equity transactions.
Immediately prior to joining Thompson & Knight, Mr. Labastida served as a Partner in the Finance Practice Group at Haynes and Boone, SC in Mexico City. Prior to that he was the founding Partner of the Banking and Finance Practice at Bufete Labastida, S.C. and a Partner in the Banking and Finance Practice Group at Jauregui, Navarrete y Nader, S.C.
Recognized for his legal work, Mr. Labastida has been selected for inclusion among the Top 100 Latin American Lawyers by Latinvex (2015-2018) and named one of The Best Lawyers in Mexico® by Woodward/White Inc. (2005-2018). He has also been recognized in Chambers Global and Chambers Latin America by Chambers and Partners (2003-2018). Mr. Labastida received his law degree (J.D. equivalent) from the Instituto Tecnológico Autónomo de México (ITAM) in 1990. He is a native Spanish speaker and is licensed to practice in Mexico.
About Thompson & Knight
Established in 1887, Thompson & Knight is a full-service law firm with more than 300 attorneys. The Firm provides legal solutions to clients and communities around the world and is particularly recognized for its depth of experience and capabilities on behalf of the energy industry. Thompson & Knight has been named “Law Firm of the Year” in Natural Resources Law (2018) and in Oil & Gas Law (2011-2013, 2015, 2017) in U.S. News-Best Lawyers® “Best Law Firms.” For more information, visit www.tklaw.com.
